![](https://winnsborotexas.com/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=64)


The City of Winnsboro is a Type A general law municipality.

Our governing body, the City Council, consists of a Mayor and five aldermen, who serve two-year terms and are elected at large. Annual elections are held on the first Saturday in May as provided by Election Code Section 141.001; Local Government Code Section 22.032.

1. #### [City Council](https://winnsborotexas.com/168/City-Council)

   Learn about the City Council, including member information and meeting times.
2. #### [City Government: How It Works](https://winnsborotexas.com/170/City-Government-How-It-Works)

   Find various documents and websites to learn how City Government works.

1. View the City of Winnsboro Code of Ordinances online.
